name: Milo
short_description: Energetic and playful. Loves to cuddle.
long_description: Milo is a lively Labrador who loves long walks and fetch games. He's well-behaved around kids and other pets. He's vaccinated and ready for a new forever home.

name: Whiskers
long_description: Whiskers is a domestic shorthair cat who loves exploring and climbing. She's gentle, vaccinated, and litter-trained. A great companion for any cat lover.

name: Charlie
long_description: Charlie is a mature Golden Retriever who’s trained, vaccinated, and very gentle with children. He enjoys quiet environments and is ideal for families.

name: Luna
short_description: Playful kitten with a sweet meow.
long_description: Luna is a curious and loving kitten. She’s full of energy, enjoys attention, and is fully litter-trained. She needs a caring home to grow up in.

name: Buddy
short_description: Gentle giant who loves belly rubs.
long_description: Buddy is a German Shepherd with a calm demeanor. He’s great with children and other dogs. Fully vaccinated, leash-trained, and obedient.

name: Bella
short_description: Tiny, fluffy, and full of love.
long_description: Bella is a baby Persian cat who loves sleeping in cozy corners and purring next to people. She needs a warm, loving environment to thrive.

name: Max
short_description: Senior dog with a heart of gold.
long_description: Max is a senior Beagle looking for a peaceful home. He’s calm, doesn’t bark much, and is happy just being around you. Ideal for elderly adopters.

name: Coco
short_description: Sassy and smart. Loves fish snacks.
long_description: Coco is a Siamese cat with a big personality. She’s vocal, intelligent, and affectionate once she gets to know you. Indoor only and litter-trained.

name: Rocky
long_description: Rocky is a Pit Bull mix who’s incredibly friendly and full of energy. He’s leash-trained, crate-trained, and loves playing outdoors.

name: Snowy
long_description: Snowy is a white Angora kitten. She’s soft, calm, and loves sitting by the window. Litter-trained and gets along with other cats.

name: Floppy
long_description: Floppy is a sweet and calm rabbit who enjoys cuddles and soft bedding. She's perfect for apartment life and loves interacting gently with kids.

name: Kiwi
short_description: Colorful parrot with a cheeky personality.
long_description: Kiwi is a young parakeet that’s learning to mimic sounds. She’s playful and friendly. Ideal for someone who wants a chatty companion.

name: Bubbles
long_description: Bubbles is a calm, mature cat who enjoys laying in the sun and watching birds through the window. She’s fully vaccinated and neutered.

name: Oreo
short_description: Black and white bunny with attitude.
long_description: Oreo is a spunky rabbit who loves hopping around and nibbling veggies. He's litter-box trained and responds well to routines.

name: Zeus
long_description: Zeus is a loyal Rottweiler who is obedient and well-trained. He's protective, yet gentle with family. Needs an owner who can handle large breeds.

name: Peanut
short_description: Tiny canary with a beautiful voice.
long_description: Peanut is a baby canary who chirps cheerfully in the morning. He's still learning to fly and would love a safe cage with space to stretch his wings.

name: Dusty
long_description: Dusty takes a little time to warm up but becomes very affectionate once settled. She's been dewormed and vaccinated, and is litter-trained.

name: Bolt
long_description: Bolt is a Greyhound mix with an energetic nature. He loves running, fetching, and long outdoor adventures. Perfect for active families.

name: Mango
long_description: Mango is a vibrant green parrot who loves to mimic sounds and whistle. She’s a fun-loving bird and enjoys company throughout the day.

name: Maple
long_description: Maple is a calm, affectionate rabbit who enjoys head rubs and soft bedding. She’s healthy, vaccinated, and used to being around kids.
